tooltip.artron_generator.purpose: Converts Forge Energy to Artron Energy.
tooltip.artron_converter.purpose: Converts Artron Energy to Forge Energy.
tooltip.artron_generator.attunable: This block must be attuned in a Tardis Engine.
tooltip.artron_charger.purpose: Charges Artron Batteries using FE power. Power input is on the bottom.
tooltip.attunement_warning: WARNING: This block has not been attuned properly and will not function!
block.security_warning: WARNING: This block is not attuned to this TARDIS!
